text:
current wix task cannot add extra arguments for light processing, for example we need link wixca library when doing light, current wix task only accept extra candle parameters, but not extra light arguments such as:

#light sample.wixobj ${wix.home}\wixui.wixlib -loc ${wix.home}\wixUI_en-us.wxl

A proposal is to add 

<extraLightArg value="-loc"/>
<extraLightArg pathValue="${wix.home}/wixUI_en-us.wxl"/>

inside <wix>

Created attachment 23441
A patched WixTask.java to accept additional nested element extraLightArg
